text: Which of the following statement(s) about TCP timers is/are TRUE? (a) TCP uses a Keepalive Timer to deal with a zero-window-size deadlock situation. (b) The TCP Persistence Timer feature provides a mechanism to identify dead connections. (c) TCP uses a Time Wait Timer to prevent delayed segments from one connection being misinterpreted as being part of a subsequent connection. (d) TCP use a Retransmission Timer for retransmission of lost segments
